content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I believe that the property is in a prime location and has many desirable features that would make it an attractive option for a tenant. What rental price are you looking to offer for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am interested in negotiating the rental price. Is there any possibility to negotiate a lower price?
name: James Smith

content: Certainly, I am open to discussing adjusting the rental price based on the specific needs and circumstances of the tenant. Please provide me with more information about your situation and what you are looking for in a rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student who will be living in the apartment alone. I am dependable and responsible. My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

The apartment is 25 square meters and located in the city center.

I am willing to negotiate, but I want to make sure that I have a reliable and respectful landlord.

What rental price do you propose?

I want to accept the rental price proposed by you.
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. Based on the information you have provided, I am willing to offer a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price reflects the prime location of the apartment and its desirable features, but I am open to discussing adjustments based on your specific needs and circumstances. I want to ensure that the rental price is fair and reasonable for both parties, and I am confident that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
